entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:41 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 8:06 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: E 33 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle changing to drizzle this morning and ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning late this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
